title: New: Kanzi – Water
body:
Hailing from Brighton, **Kanzi** look set to follow in the footsteps of the likes of **IYES** and **Phoria**, racing up the Hype Machine with their folk-tinged electro-pop.

New single _Water_ comes complete with niche samples, a heart-string tugging chorus and an overwhelming sense of melancholy. Check out Water below, and keep your eyes peeled for future tour dates.
